volunteer_experience.info:
The National Service Scheme (NSS) is a Central Sector Scheme of the Government of India, Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports. It provides an opportunity for the student youth of Technical Institution, Graduate & Post Graduate at colleges and University level of India to participate in various government led community service activities & programs. The sole aim of the NSS is to provide hands-on experience to young students in delivering community service.‚Ä¢ Tried to empower the students of‚Ä¶
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          The National Service Scheme (NSS) is a Central Sector Scheme of the Government of India, Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports. It provides an opportunity for the student youth of Technical Institution, Graduate & Post Graduate at colleges and University level of India to participate in various government led community service activities & programs. The sole aim of the NSS is to provide hands-on experience to young students in delivering community service.‚Ä¢ Tried to empower the students of Talbagicha and Hiradi about education, science, English, heritage, and culture. Motivated them towards their interest and tried to create general awareness about basic technology and ways to overcome the digital divide. ‚Ä¢ In December 2019 we contributed to growing a Mango farm in Shyameshwarpur, Medinipur, West Bengal.‚Ä¢ Got selected as the best volunteer during the winter camp among 600+ volunteers held in Dec 2019.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
